charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was having a
Pokémon battle with Victor and Hop in
the mountains.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1101_0200:
The sun had gone down, so the three decided to
set up camp.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_0400: It was amazing! Great cooking as usual, Victor!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_0500:
Of course! Balancing the spices and preparing the
ingredients is important when making a curry.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_0401_0700:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! A dish isn’t
complete until people have enjoyed it!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_0302_0800: I bet you can make it even better!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_0402_0900:
Haha, you’re a harsh critic,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! But honest
feedback helps me get better!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1000:
I’ve been cooking a lot since I was in Postwick
in Galar.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1100:
Postwick’s full of pastures, with clean air and
beautiful nature.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1200:
We’re able to grow a lot of our own stuff, so I
think that’s where I started to enjoy cooking.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1300:
Cooking is the science of food! I bet it’d be
worth studying!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1400:
Yeah! I’m always impressed when I find a new
combination to try out.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1500: I also really like thinking up new recipes.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1600:
I used to lean on Wooloo at the ranch on
sunny days...
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_1700:
I’d look up at the sky and think stuff like,
“Hey, that cloud looks like a Slowpoke tail, so
today I’m making baked tail curry!”
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_0402_2100: Yeah, it sure was a productive time for me!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2200: And I didn’t just use that time to think about food...
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2300:
When you look into the wide sky, it’s like your
vision widens up, and you can think things
through calmly.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2400:
I think that may be the reason why I tend to think
a lot during Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2500:
That’s true—you do! And when we’re battling,
it seems like Rillaboom does the same thing!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2600:
Even when I think I have the upper hand, you
never panic...
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2700:
And the next thing you know, the tables
are turned!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2800:
Rillaboom listens to my orders and accurately
executes them.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_2900:
Hmm, I think I’m more of a “just give it a shot”
type of person! It’s a different style than yours.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_3000:
It’s interesting how each person has a
different style.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_3100: Hop, Gloria, and I are all different...
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_3200:
And [Name:PlayerNickname ] has a style 
perfect for [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_3300:
I feel like I understand that more since coming
to Pasio!
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_3400:
I managed to learn so much from training with you
three today.
charaepi_ch0242_00_masaru/2301_1201_3500: Let’s camp, eat curry, and battle again sometime!
